attributes.action: enact or amend legislation prohibiting the playing of loud music on public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By playing loud music through your headphones, you disturb other transport users. This problem is exacerbated with the recent rise of mobile phone devices that encourage users to play music out loud. This petition campaigns for the enforcement of fines and punishment on anti-social commuters and public transport users who play music loud enough to disturb others travelling with them.
